Commentary: Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, good length at off stump, steps down and turns it off his pads to fine leg. Wasn't to the pitch there
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, good length, angled into the pads, steps out and pushes on the up to long-on
Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, short and on the pads, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, good length at leg stump, steps out, not to the pitch, inside edge into the leg side and a slight hesitation
Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, back of a length at middle, pushed to long-on's right, they want two but he's run in quickly and relased that in no time
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, good length at the pads, flicked to square leg
Mohammad Amir to Ahmed Shehzad, 4 leg byes, back of a length, shaped into the thighs, catches the guard and flies past short fine leg
Mohammad Amir to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, full outside off, no shape this time, gets the attempted cover drive on the bottom

Mohammad Amir to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 leg byes, good length on the pads, shimmies across slightly, gets it on the thigh guard again, Sanga puts a one-handed dive to his left but parries it past short fine
Mohammad Amir to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length in the corridor, expects it to come back in, but it flies past the outside edge
Mohammad Amir to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, good length and angled wide outside off, throws his hands at it, beaten
Mohammad Amir to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length in the corridor, back foot defence
Usman Khan to Asad Shafiq, no run, full outside off, leans into the cover drive, straight to short extra cover
Usman Khan to Asad Shafiq, FOUR, back of a length outside off, attempted pull, top edge, flies over the slips
Usman Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, good length on the pads, flicked through midwicket
Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, full and outside off, clears the front foot and drives straight to mid-off
Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length at middle, opens the face and slices it straight to cover on the up
Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, good length at middle, pushed tentatively to mid-off off the back foot
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, wide of the crease, angles this onto the pads, and he happily glances that past short fine leg
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, good length on the pads, clipped wide of mid-on
Sohail Khan to Asad Shafiq, no run, good length, angled in at middle, punched on the up to mid-on
Sohail Khan to Asad Shafiq, FOUR, back of a length outside off, got leg side of it and flayed it off the middle over covers, good shot
Sohail Khan to Asad Shafiq, no run, back of a length at middle, shoveled on the up to mid-on
Sohail Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, follows him as he makes room, short pitched, down the leg, pulled out to deep square
Usman Khan to Asad Shafiq, FOUR, good length at middle, whips it past mid-on on the up
Usman Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, back of a length, angled across the corridor, pushed back towards mid-on
Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, bouncer at middle stump, sways away and nails the hook shot, floored, but straight to the fielder in the deep
Usman Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, back of a length at leg stump, gets deep in the crease and pulls to deep square
Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, misses the bouncer, back of a length at middle, it sits up nicely on this languid pitch, he pulls it off the front foot in front of square, one bounce

Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, good length, angled across from leg stump, goes for the flick, closes the face too early but the leading edge goes over the bowler and to mid-on, send his partner back after he'd taken a couple of strides down, but the shy at the stumps misses
Mohammad Amir to Asad Shafiq, no run, back of a length outside off, goes for the back foot punch, checks it last minute and pushes to extra cover
Mohammad Amir to Asad Shafiq, 2 runs, good length at middle stump, leans forward and flicks it fine, deep square leg runs to his right and puts in a dive close to the ropes

Mohammad Amir to Asad Shafiq, no run, dropped! Slower bouncer, he's through the pull shot early and his eyes are off the ball, balloons up for Pollard at short extra, who takes two strides, gets low and puts down a very simple catch that he made look more complicated than it was
Mohammad Amir to Asad Shafiq, FOUR, back of a length on the hips, glanced fine and deep square is not getting to that
Mohammad Amir to Asad Shafiq, FOUR, full outside off, clears the front foot and clatters it between non-striker and the stumps
Mohammad Amir to Asad Shafiq, no run, good length, angled in at off stump, dabbed to backward point
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, good length at off stump, pushes forward and drops it into the off-side
Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, good length at off stump, hangs back and mistimes the back foot punch that rolls feebly to deep cover
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, tossed up at middle, driven back to the bowler
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, full outside off, driven to covers
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, tossed up outside off, steps down the track and drives it long-off
Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, tossed up at off stump, goes for the reverse sweep, but hits it straight to short third man
Usama Mir to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, good length at middle, goes right forward and opens the face to push it past cover
Usama Mir to Ahmed Shehzad, SIX, good length outside off, not quite to the pitch, but goes against the turn anyway. Brave shot, works for him, drags it over long-on
Usama Mir to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, short and wide, hangs back, picks the spot nicely between point and short third man with his cut
Usama Mir to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, drops it short outside off, he jumps back and pulls this nicely between deep midwicket and long-on
Usama Mir to Ahmed Shehzad, SIX, classy! Tossed up at middle, steps down the track, gets to the pitch and lifts it over long-on
Usama Mir to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, tossed up outside off, waits on it and drives it to sweeper cover
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, good length at off stump, defended back to the bowler
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, full at off stump, driven to long-off
Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, no run, good length outside off, steps out, drives on the up to cover
Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, good length, angled into the pads, turned away to short fine
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, SIX, Shehzad is tired of all the Gayle talk. Tossed up at middle, steps out, gets on top of it and lifts it over the bowler with a nice follow through
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, good length, arm ball at off stump, goes back and just about taps it back to the bowler as it slides in
Usman Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, full slower ball at off stump from around the wicket, jammed out to long-on
Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, back of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot to point, who has a shy, hits the stumps and concedes a run
Usman Khan to Asad Shafiq, FOUR, slower bouncer, steps out and is baffled, goes through with the pull, gets a top edge, goes to Sanga's left and fine leg's right
Usman Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, back of a length at middle, smashes this pull shot straight to deep square
Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, back of a length, into the pads, pushed into the leg side with soft hands and Pollard has to run in a long way from deep square on this big ground
Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, good length, angled into the pads, and pushed into the leg side with soft hands once again

Usama Mir to Asad Shafiq, 2 runs, dropped short outside off, pulled to long-on's right, throws it in as they've come back for a two. Bowler takes the bails off and umpire reviews...geez, the ball wasn't in his hands as he took the bails off why did he appeal, and why did it get referred?.
Usama Mir to Asad Shafiq, no run, full toss at middle stump, goes for the slog, inside edge onto the pad
Usama Mir to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, short and wide outside off, cut straight to sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, tossed up on off, driven past the bowler's left, to bring up and impressive fifty
Usama Mir to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, tossed up at off stump, gets low and sweeps it to deep square
Usama Mir to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, tossed up outside off, drives it to sweeper cover to bring up the 100 stand
Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, almost throws it away. Good length, angled in at off stump, walks right across the stumps to ramp it, but it misses the stumps
Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, full slower ball outside off, steps out, yorks himself and jams it out towards sweeper
Usman Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, slower short one down the leg, gets a glove on his attempted pull and it drops in the pitch area
Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, back of a length, angled in at middle, goes back and pushes it to long-on
Usman Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, short and wide, chopped to third man
Usman Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, good length at off stump, slices it off the front foot, Imad Wasim puts in a dive and has a shy at the stumps, would've been gone with a direct hit
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, OUT, back of a length at middle, backs away and goes for the pull, top-edges and Pollard calls loudly as he gets under this at deep square leg and pouches it
Wicket: ['Ahmed Shehzad c Pollard b Sohail Khan 54 (40b 4x4 3x6) SR: 135.00']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Asad Shafiq, SIX, attempted bouncer, goes for the hook, top edge, six over short fine leg and that is Shafiq's fifty, reported correctly this time
Sohail Khan to Asad Shafiq, no run, superb back-of-the-hand slower ball outside off, steps down the track and misses it wide outside off

Sohail Khan to Asad Shafiq, OUT, oh, superb throw! Another back-of-the-hand slower ball, chopped straight to point, KP has taken off. There wasn't a run there. He's sent back, but there was no point in even trying. Stood and hoped for the best, but Imad Wasim was perfect there. Clean pick up, throw full of intent, and knocks the stumps over
Sohail Khan to Asad Shafiq, no run, bouncer at middle stump, goes for the hooks, flies over his head and sees the bowler in his face as he recovers
Sohail Khan to Asad Shafiq, OUT, it's three in the over! Short at middle stump, backs himself on the hook shot once again, middles it, it's aerial and straight to deep square! What's happening here?
Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, back of a length in the corridor, tries to run it down to third man, beaten on the outside edge
Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, back of a length outside off, shapes nicely, hits the ball on the head and places the pull shot regally through midwicket
Wicket: ['Asad Shafiq c Mohammad Amir b Sohail Khan 51 (38b 6x4 1x6) SR: 134.21']

Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, back of a length at off stump, pushed into the covers, slight hesitation, Bopara is thinking of the throw before he catches it and lets them free with that fumble
Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, no run, back of a length at off stump, punched straight to covers
Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, 1 run, back of a length outside off, turned towards backward point
Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, good length outside off, driven on the up to sweeper
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, back of a length on the hips, glanced down to fine leg
Sohail Khan to Rossouw, 2 runs, back of a length outside off, pulls across the line, wide of long-on
Sohail Khan to Rossouw, 1 run, slower ball, pull at the pads, pushed to deep midwicket
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, good length, slower ball, cuts inside from outside off, tries to chop to third man, inside edge onto the pad
Sohail Khan to Rossouw, 2 runs, short and wide, gets on his toes as it climbs on him and lifts it over point
Sohail Khan to Rossouw, FOUR, back of a length at off, steps out, makes room and spanks it well in front of square
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, tossed up at off stump, driven to long-off
Usama Mir to Rossouw, 1 bye, good length outside off, turns back sharply as he attempts a late cut and misses and misses off stump by a centimeter
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, dropped short at off, pulls it to midwicket
Usama Mir to Rossouw, 1 run, good length at middle stump, presses forward and turns it to deep midwicket
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, tossed up outside off, gets low and converts it into a full toss to drag it to deep square
Usama Mir to Rossouw, 1 run, tossed up at middle stump, driven to long-off
Shoaib Malik to Rossouw, no run, good length at leg stump, backs away and punches it to cover
Shoaib Malik to Rossouw, no run, good length outside off, slapped to covers
Shoaib Malik to Rossouw, 3 runs, good length at middle stump, goes for the drive, not to the pitch, outside edge rolls away through the empty first slip region
Shoaib Malik to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, good length on the pads, pushed to deep square
Shoaib Malik to Rossouw, no run, good length off, pokes at it, beaten. Good offspinner's ball
Shoaib Malik to Rossouw, no run, full outside off, enough of the poking he says, goes for the reverse sweep, but misses that too
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, dropped short at off stump, cut straight to point

Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, good length at off, looped nicely, goes for the inside-out shot over cover but isn't to the pitch and gets a thick outside edge that falls just short of short third man
Usama Mir to Rossouw, no run, googly, good length outside off, yet another poke, beaten yet again

Usama Mir to Rossouw, OUT, googly at leg stump, he feels the pressure, steps out, not to the pitch as he throws an ugly swipe at it. Top edge flies between Sanga and short fine. Sanga calls for it and puts out the gloves away from his body after running a couple of yards backwards
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, flighted, good length at middle, goes forward and whips across the turn to long-on
Usama Mir to Mahmudullah, FOUR, good length outside off, goes for the reverse sweep first ball and gets it past slip
Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 leg bye, slowre bouncer at middle stump, through the shot early and it hits him plush on the helmet as he closes his eyes on this. He runs through and is fine
Wicket: ['RR Rossouw c †Sangakkara b Usama Mir 15 (16b 1x4 0x6) SR: 93.75']

Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Mahmudullah, 1 run, back of a length, angled across off stump, steps out and tries to pummel this on the up over cover, thick outside edge to third man
Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, good length outside off from around, driven to mid-off's left
Mohammad Amir to Mahmudullah, 2 runs, full on the pads, flicked out to deep square leg
Mohammad Amir to Mahmudullah, 1 run, back of a length outside off, under-edges his late cut, straight to point
Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, short and wide outside off, lifts it neatly over point with his cut and keeps his team rooted to the top position and assuredly into the play-offs
